00027 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00028 #ifndef __PWM_H
00029 #define __PWM_H
00030 
00031 #ifdef __cplusplus
00032  extern "C" {
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00036 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00037 
00038 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00039 #define HTCFG_PWM_TM_PRESCALER                    (1)         // 1 ~ 65535
00040 #define HTCFG_PWM_FREQ_HZ                         (50000)
00041 #define HTCFG_PWM_IDLE_STATE                      (0)         // 0: 0 duty, 1: 100 duty
00042 
00043 #define HTCFG_PWM_TM_RELOAD                       (HTCFG_PWM_TM_PCLK / HTCFG_PWM_TM_PRESCALER / HTCFG_PWM_FREQ_HZ)
00044 #if (HTCFG_PWM_TM_RELOAD > 65536)
00045 #error "HTCFG_PWM_TM_RELOAD out of range! Should be less than or equal to 65536."
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 #define HTCFG_PWM0_EN                             (1)
00049 #define HTCFG_PWM1_EN                             (1)
00050 
00051 #if (HTCFG_PWM_2CHANNEL)
00052 #define HTCFG_PWM2_EN                             (0)
00053 #define HTCFG_PWM3_EN                             (0)
00054 #else
00055 #define HTCFG_PWM2_EN                             (1)
00056 #define HTCFG_PWM3_EN                             (1)
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00060 #define HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT                         STRCAT2(HT_,       HTCFG_PWM_TM_IPN)
00061 #if (HTCFG_PWM0_EN == 1)
00062 #define PWM_CH0                                   STRCAT2(TM_CH_,    HTCFG_PWM0_CHN)
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 #if (HTCFG_PWM1_EN == 1)
00066 #define PWM_CH1                                   STRCAT2(TM_CH_,    HTCFG_PWM1_CHN)
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 #if (HTCFG_PWM2_EN == 1)
00070 #define PWM_CH2                                   STRCAT2(TM_CH_,    HTCFG_PWM2_CHN)
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 #if (HTCFG_PWM3_EN == 1)
00074 #define PWM_CH3                                   STRCAT2(TM_CH_,    HTCFG_PWM3_CHN)
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 #define PWM_DUTY_0       (0)
00078 #define PWM_DUTY_25      (HTCFG_PWM_TM_RELOAD * 0.25)
00079 #define PWM_DUTY_50      (HTCFG_PWM_TM_RELOAD * 0.5)
00080 #define PWM_DUTY_75      (HTCFG_PWM_TM_RELOAD * 0.75)
00081 #define PWM_DUTY_100     (0xFFFF)
00082 
00083 #define PWM_FREQ_50K     (HTCFG_PWM_TM_PCLK / HTCFG_PWM_TM_PRESCALER / 50000)
00084 #define PWM_FREQ_40K     (HTCFG_PWM_TM_PCLK / HTCFG_PWM_TM_PRESCALER / 40000)
00085 #define PWM_FREQ_12K     (HTCFG_PWM_TM_PCLK / HTCFG_PWM_TM_PRESCALER / 12000)
00086 
00087 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 void PWM_Init(void);
00089 void PWM_Cmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00090 
00091 #if 1
00092 #define PWM_SetFreq(uReload)     TM_SetCounterReload(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, uReload)
00093 #define PWM_UpdateDuty(CH, CMP)  TM_SetCaptureCompare(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, CH, CMP)
00094 #else
00095 void PWM_SetFreq(u32 uReload);
00096 void PWM_UpdateDuty(TM_CH_Enum TM_CH_n, u32 uCompare);
00097 #endif
00098 
00099 #ifdef __cplusplus
00100 }
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 #endif
